available. The pre-processing steps included:
 Pre-processing accelerometer and gyroscope using noise ﬁlters.
 Splitting data into ﬁxed windows of 2.56 seconds (128 data points) with 50% overlap.
 Splitting of accelerometer data into gravitational (total) and body motion components.
These signals were preprocessed for noise reduction with a median ﬁlter and a 3rd
order low-pass Butterworth ﬁlter with a 20 Hz cutoﬀ frequency. [...] The acceleration
